settings.label: Enable demo store
settings.info: If enabled random images and menus will be used.

settings.content: [Click here to follow an interactive Tutorial](https://vimeo.com/458179586)

info.en: If you don't have a logo yet, this text will be used instead.

settings.label: Favicon
settings.info: You can use your logo as your favicon, just make sure to select it here as well.

settings.content: [Click here to follow an interactive Tutorial](https://vimeo.com/458179587)

settings.info: You can set your contact information and your location here. These are not mandatory.
These links will be used throughout the theme for the purposes of sharing, liking and promoting your social media.

settings.content: [Click here to follow an interactive Tutorial](https://vimeo.com/458179527)

settings.label: Maximum website width (px)
settings.info: This defines the maximum width the content of your site can stretch to.

settings.label: Default big element border radius
settings.info: Big elements include: minicart container, images, modals.

settings.label: Default small element border radius
settings.info: Small elements include: swatches, buttons, tags, labels.

settings.content: The above settings define a global border radius of small and big elements on your website. Global radius is the curvature of borders. If your elements don't have custom border radius defined, they will fallback to this setting.

settings.label: Default border width
settings.info: This defines global border width of all elements of your website. If your elements don't have custom border width defined, they will fallback to this setting.
Margins and paddings define the amount of empty space between the site's elements. This allows your elements to breathe and makes your page easy to navigate.

settings.content: These settings can be overriden on element-by-element/section-by-section basis.
[Click here to follow an interactive Tutorial](https://vimeo.com/458179473)

settings.label: Empty search collection
settings.info: This collection will be shown if user is yet to search for a product.

settings.content: [Click here to follow an interactive Tutorial](https://vimeo.com/458179397)

settings.label: Text color
settings.info: Color used for content such as product names and descriptions.

settings.label: Title text color
settings.info: Color for titles and headings.

settings.label: Secondary Background Color
settings.info: Color that's being used for neutral elements such as breadcrumbs.

settings.label: Secondary text color
settings.info: This color will be used for subheadings, brand names and other secondary content.

settings.label: Primary accent text color
settings.info: This color should have good contrast ratio on top of primary accent color.

settings.label: Alert color
settings.info: This color will be used for urgency indicators such as stock left, cart expiry and alikes.

settings.content: [Click here to follow an interactive Tutorial](https://vimeo.com/458179468)

settings.label: Base font
settings.info: This font is, by default, being used for most of the text, including content (product name, product description), labels (SALE), navigation links, etc.

settings.label: Title font
settings.info: This font is, by default, used for titles and headings.

settings.label: Custom Base Font
settings.info: Use the custom font if enabled and value available

settings.label: Custom Title Font
settings.info: Use the custom font if enabled and value available

options.value: Candara, Calibri, Segoe, 'Segoe UI', Optima, Arial, sans-serif
options.label: Candara

options.value: 'Calisto MT', 'Bookman Old Style', Bookman, 'Goudy Old Style', Garamond, 'Hoefler Text', 'Bitstream Charter', Georgia, serif
options.label: Calisto MT

options.value: Baskerville, 'Baskerville Old Face', 'Hoefler Text', Garamond, 'Times New Roman', serif
options.label: Baskerville

options.value: Garamond, Baskerville, 'Baskerville Old Face', 'Hoefler Text', 'Times New Roman', serif
options.label: Garamond

options.value: TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif
options.label: Times New Roman

settings.label: Small font size
settings.info: This is the font size for information such as the brand name on a product card, but can be used in other places in the theme.

settings.label: Base font size
settings.info: This is the font size for most of the site's content, including, but not limited to, product description, product name, navigation links.

settings.label: Medium font size
settings.info: This font size is by default used for headings and titles.

settings.label: Big font size
settings.info: This font size is by default not being used in the theme.
If set to 0, default values from above will be used.

settings.label: Heading font size
settings.info: This font size is used by section headings.

settings.label: Subheading font size
settings.info: This font size is used by section subheadings.

settings.content: [Click here to follow an interactive Tutorial](https://vimeo.com/458179407)

settings.info: This button style will be used for 'Add to cart', 'Checkout' and CTAs.

settings.label: Custom primary button hover fill color
Custom primary button hover text color
Enable custom border
settings.info: Enables global settings override for border width and radius.
This button style will be used for 'Add to cart', 'Checkout' and CTAs.

settings.label: Custom secondary button hover fill color
Custom secondary button hover text color
Enable custom border
settings.info: Enables global settings override for border width and radius.

settings.content: This color will be used for quantity inputs as well as swatches and various dropdowns.

settings.label: Enable custom border
settings.info: Enables global settings override for border width and radius.

settings.content: [Click here to follow an interactive Tutorial](https://vimeo.com/458179341)
Add to cart/Quick buy button (Product card & page)

settings.label: Enable 'Free + Shipping'
settings.info: Replaces the Add-to-cart text with the defined one, for products where price is set to free ($0)

settings.content: Booster 6.0.0 marks a complete change in theme architecture and that includes headers. Current headers are somewhat limited in customization, but we are working hard to bring you more customizations and new header layouts.
[Click here to follow an interactive Tutorial](https://vimeo.com/458179271)

settings.label: Space between cards
settings.info: This represents the amount of space between product and collection cards.

settings.label: Image fit

options.label: Adjust ratio to fill empty space - crop image

settings.info: In case your card's image doesn't fit the image ratio you've selected below, the image can either:

settings.content: Preserve ratio - the whole image will be shown in its original dimensions, but may cause empty/white space to appear
Adjust the ratio to fill empty space - if the image doesn't fit the ratio, it will be cropped and adjusted to fill the card - no empty/white space
The above fields represent your card image's ratio in a (X:Y) [width:height] ratio. Default being 1:1 (square). Other popular ratios include: 16:9, 4:3 and 3:2.
[Click here to follow an interactive Tutorial](https://vimeo.com/458179271)

settings.label: Make the card button full width
Show product gallery instead of a single image
settings.info: Replaces the product card image with a gallery of images.

settings.label: Show secondary product image on hover
settings.info: Doesn't work with Gallery cards (above setting).

settings.content: If no colors are set, default ones will be used.

settings.label: Limit amount
settings.info: Amount of units to limit after. Either words or characters. (eg. Setting it to 5 will show either 5 words or 5 characters depending on the above setting. If Don't limit is selected, this value is ignored.

settings.content: [Click here to follow an interactive Tutorial](https://vimeo.com/458179213)

settings.label: Tags margin
settings.info: Amount of space between tags and the edges of a card.

settings.content: [Click here to follow an interactive Tutorial](https://vimeo.com/458179271)
[Click here to follow an interactive Tutorial](https://vimeo.com/458179204)
[Click here to follow an interactive Tutorial](https://vimeo.com/458179150)

settings.label: Show selected variant's image
settings.info: Selects/Scrolls to the selected variant's featured image.

settings.label: Alternative selector options
settings.info: List of comma (,) separated options to use an alternative selector for. (If above setting is "Dropdown" it will use "Swatch", and vice-versa)

settings.label: Disable Sold Out options
settings.info: If turned on, sold out options won't be clickable. Leave it turned off for use with Coming Soon/Restock apps.

settings.label: Disabled options style
settings.info: If the swatch logic is set to "Amazon", disabled options will be visible for the purpose of reselection!

settings.label: Preselect swatch
settings.info: Preselects a swatch in advance. You can either disable it (None), select the first option (First option) or preselect a variant based on query params/first available.

settings.label: Color only option names
settings.info: A comma-separated list of options you want to use COLOR SWATCHES for. Defaults to color,colour.

settings.label: Custom color codes
settings.info: Paste your custom colors separated by a comma (,).

settings.label: Image option names
settings.info: A comma-separated list of options you want to use IMAGE SWATCHES for. It falls back to colors if an image is not available. Defaults to material.

settings.content: [Click here to follow an interactive Tutorial](https://vimeo.com/458179177)

settings.label: Enable Quickbuy
settings.info: If turned on, products with multiple variants will be opened in a Quickbuy modal for customers to view and add to cart. If disabled, clicking on the button will redirect them to the product's page.

settings.label: Mailchimp Action
settings.info: Instructions on how to find form action can be found [here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mQ6UFLP_iEI)

settings.content: This will be the home of all advanced optimization settings in one place.

settings.label: Use inline SVGs for lazyloading
settings.info: Turning this on will reduce the amount of requests necessary by inlining a placeholder (lightgrey) SVG until the original image is loaded.

settings.label: Enable native LazyLoading
settings.info: Take advantage of native Lazyloading [loading="lazy"] in modern browsers. You lose the ability to have placeholders be shown, but you might gain performance points in modern browsers. Old browsers will use the built-in Booster LazyLoad script.

settings.content: [Click here to follow an interactive Tutorial](https://vimeo.com/458179144)

settings.label: Use geolocation to apply personalized i18n settings
settings.info: Based on user's IP, their native language and currency will be used - if available.

settings.label: Enable multi-language website
settings.info: This integrates natively with Shopify's multi-language website setup.

settings.label: Enabled currencies
settings.info: Comma (,) separated list of ISO currency codes. This only applies to currency conversion.

settings.label: Enable Copycat Stopper
settings.info: If enabled, theme will prevent copying and inspecting code.

settings.label: Prevent content copying
settings.info: If enabled, theme will prevent copying text (content) of the website. Copycat MUST be enabled in order for this setting to work.

settings.label: On page titles
settings.info: Titles to rotate when customer is on the page. If left blank, it will not be used.

settings.label: Left page titles
settings.info: Titles to rotate when customer is not actively on the page. If left blank, it will not be used.

settings.label: Cart timer duration
settings.info: The duration of a countdown timer, expressed in minutes.

settings.content: [Click here to follow an interactive Tutorial](https://vimeo.com/458179091)

settings.label: Show offer countdown on product cards

settings.content: Interval - enter a number and choose one of the values from a dropdown (days, hours..).
Exact date - just enter the date in a YYYY/MM/DD format. For example using 2020/08/01 would make the countdown tick until August 1st 2020.

settings.label: Maximum randomization
settings.info: If you set this above 0, your timer will be randomized by +- the value you chose. (Days will be used if you entered a date)

settings.content: [Click here to follow an interactive Tutorial](https://vimeo.com/458179066)

settings.label: Recently bought collection
settings.info: If no collection is chosen, up to 15 best selling items will be used.

settings.label: Image type
settings.info: Determines whether or not will the image have surrounding space.

settings.label: Show names who recently bought an item
settings.info: If this is disabled 'Someone' will be used instead.

settings.label: List of names (comma separated ',')
settings.default: Alissa Ashford, Carroll Calley, Augustina Angulo, Kenna Kuntz, Hailey Hinkle, Breann Beckham, Raquel Roles, Bernetta Beeks, Sol Silverio, Somer Sherrell, Yadira Yann, Belva Bumpus, Arlen Atherton, Huey Hanway, Suzette Stayton, Jeffry Jason, Libby Levasseur, Shaun Sparkman, Alison Almon, Rocco Rexroat
settings.info: A comma separated list of names to be used. Use full names. They will be formatted automatically according to your settings.

settings.content: [Click here to follow an interactive Tutorial](https://vimeo.com/458178996)

settings.label: What review app are you using
Free shipping amount
settings.info: Free shipping amount without currency, formatted with a decimal point YY.XX (eg. for $120.95 you'd input 120.95, for $10 you'd input 10.00)

settings.content: [Click here to follow an interactive Tutorial](https://vimeo.com/458179015)

settings.label: Simple button
settings.info: If enabled, direct link to a Messenger chat will be shown, instead of an interactive chat. Can be used for speed optimization

settings.content: Make sure to whitelist your shop's domain in your Page settings. To do so go to your Facebook page, look for Page Settings, then click 'Advanced Messaging' on the left and find a section called 'Whitelisted Domains'. Add your domain and save the changes.

For more details check out [this page from Facebook](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/messenger-platform/reference/messenger-profile-api/domain-whitelisting/) or follow the 'Alternative way' on [this site](https://support.rocketspark.com/hc/en-us/articles/360001670547-How-to-add-Facebook-Customer-Chat-to-your-website).
Your page ID can be found using [this unofficial site](https://findmyfbid.com/) or you can follow [this tutorial from Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/help/1503421039731588).

settings.label: Page ID
settings.info: Your Facebook page ID

settings.label: Greeting
settings.default: What can we help you with?
settings.info: Message that will welcome your users.

settings.content: [Click here to follow an interactive Tutorial](https://vimeo.com/458179012)

settings.label: Notice text
settings.default: This site requires cookies in order to provide all of its functionality.

settings.content: [Click here to follow an interactive Tutorial](https://vimeo.com/458179002)

settings.label: Contact type
settings.info: Phone number and E-mail will be taken from 'Location, Contact & Social Media' settings.

settings.label: Contact page
settings.info: Used for 'Contact Page' button type.

settings.content: [Click here to follow an interactive Tutorial](https://vimeo.com/458184998)

settings.label: Head HTML
settings.info: Inserted before closing head tag (</head>). Often used to insert additional stylesheets or scripts.

settings.label: Body HTML
settings.info: Inserted before closing body tag. (</body>)

settings.label: Custom CSS
settings.info: Inserted before closing body tag (</body>), wrapped with <style></style>. This will override theme's default CSS styles.

settings.label: Enable jQuery
settings.info: Adds the latest version of jQuery before the closing body tag

settings.label: Head Javascript
settings.info: Inserted before closing head tag (</head>), wrapped with <script></script>. Executed before the page is rendered.

settings.label: Body Javascript
settings.info: Inserted before closing body tag (</body>), wrapped with <script></script>. Executed after rest of the page is rendered.

settings.content: This setting allow you to show / hide strike price on product detail page for given brand names ( here brand names are consider as product "vendor" field value.

settings.label: Show strike out price and You save text
settings.info: A comma separated list of brands to be used. Use product vendor value(s). Strike price and "You save {calculated percentage}" text will be shown automatically according to your settings.

settings.label: Show You save text
settings.info: A comma separated list of brands to be used. Use product vendor value(s). "You save {calculated percentage}" will be shown automatically according to your settings.

settings.label: Hide strike out price and You save text
settings.info: A comma separated list of brands to be used. Use product vendor value(s).  Strike price or "You save {calculated percentage}" will be hide automatically according to your settings.

settings.label: Hide strike out price
settings.info: A comma separated list of brands to be used. Use product vendor value(s).  Strike price will be hide automatically according to your settings.

settings.label: Adjust percentage
settings.info: Adjust shipping insurance percentage

settings.label: Backorder brands
settings.info: A comma separated list of brands to be used. Use product vendor value(s).  Add to cart button state will be change automatically according to your settings.

settings.label: Enables a checkout GA event(s) tracking
Enable password creation
settings.info: This will show password for sign up if customer has no account.
